item.title: Getting started with Webpack
item.description: Webpack is a static module bundler for Web applications. It analyses and processes the input application and generates output bundles. The design of Webpack architecture is highly modularised and extendable. In this post, I share here some notes on major aspects of Webpack since I’ve started learning it.
